title.rendered: Dubai International Cricket Stadium Pitch Report for Asia Cup 2022

content.rendered:
The Dubai International Cricket Stadium is the main venue for Asia Cup T20I 2022. The stadium is hosting 9 matches. Let’s look at the stats at the Dubai international stadium to understand the nature of the pitch.

Dubai International Stadium Overall T20I Stats:

The overall comparison indicates a marginal difference between the results. The team batting first has won 36 matches, whereas the team batting second has won 39 games:

  • Total T20I matches played at the stadium: 78
  • Batting 1st Won: 36
  • Batting 2nd Won: 41
  • Tie: 1
  • Avg. Score in 1st bat: 143

Dubai International Stadium T20I Stats in Last One Year

For the past year, 13 T20I matches have been played at the Dubai International Stadium. The team batting first has won just one match, whereas the team batting second has won 12 games. This indicates that chasing has become easier at the Dubai international stadium:

  • T20I matches played at the stadium: 15
  • Batting 1st Won: 1
  • Batting 2nd Won: 14
  • Avg. Score in 1st bat: 130

Also Read:

Asia Cup Fantasy Tips

Bangladesh vs Afghanistan, Asia Cup 2022 Fantasy Tips

T20I Records at Dubai International Stadium

  • Most Runs: Babar Azam is the leading run-getter at the Dubai International Stadium with 446 runs in 9 matches.
  • Most Wickets: Sohail Tanvir is the leading wicket-taker at the Dubai International Stadium with 22 wickets in 15 matches.
  • Highest total: 211/3 by Sri Lanka against Pakistan on December 13, 2013
  • Highest individual score: 93 by Guptill against Scotland on November 3, 2021
  • Best bowling figures: 5/14 by Imad Wasim against West Indies on September 23, 2016

India Team’s T20I Performance at Dubai International Stadium:

  • Matches played: 5
  • Won: 3
  • Lost: 2

Pakistan Team’s T20I Performance at Dubai International Stadium:

  • Matches played: 28
  • Won: 17
  • Lost: 12
  • Tied: 1

Bangladesh Team’s T20I Performance at Dubai International Stadium:

  • Matches played: 2
  • Won: 1
  • Lost: 1

Sri Lanka Team’s T20I Performance at Dubai International Stadium:

  • Matches played: 4
  • Won: 1
  • Lost: 3

Afghanistan Team’s T20I Performance at Dubai International Stadium:

  • Matches played: 10
  • Won: 7
  • Lost: 3

UAE Team’s T20I Performance at Dubai International Stadium:

  • Matches played: 4
  • Won: 0
  • Lost: 4

Upcoming Asia Cup T20I Matches at Dubai International Stadium

Ready with your team for matches at the Dubai International Stadium? Start playing fantasy cricket on My11Circle now!
